Name: LU 628 - Zoning, Grand Avenue & Pacific Street Rezoning, Brooklyn (C 190256 ZMK)
Title: Resolution approving with modifications the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 190256 ZMK, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 628).

History.Action: Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee with Modifications and Referred to CPC
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}}

\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920\tx8640\tab WHEREAS, EMP Capital Group,\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 16c, changing from an M1-1 District to a R7D District and establishing within the proposed R7D District a C2-4 District, which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate a nine-story mixed-use development with 64 dwelling units and ground floor commercial space located at 979 Pacific Street in the Crown Heights neighborhood of Brooklyn, Community District 8 (ULURP No. C 190256 ZMK) (the \ldblquote Application\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on February 7, 2020, its decision dated February 5, 2020 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1440\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7920 WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 190257 ZRK (L.U. No. 629), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on February 12, 2020;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\sa240\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued September 23\super rd\nosupersub , 2019 (CEQR No. 19DCP114K) which include an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials and noise (the \ldblquote E\rdblquote  Designation (E-550). \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\sa240\qj RESOLVED:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-550) and Negative Declaration.\par
\par
Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 190256 ZMK, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission with the following modifications:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar Matter double struck out is old, deleted by the City Council;\par
Matter \uldb double-underlined\ulnone  is new, added by the City Council\cf1\f1\line\cf0\f0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section 16c:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\qj\uldb 1.\tab changing from an M1-1 District to an R7A District property bounded by Grand Avenue, Pacific Street, a line 100 feet southeasterly of Grand Avenue, and a line midway between Pacific Street and Dean Street;\par
\par
\ulnone 1.\uldb 2.\ulnone\tab changing from an M1-1 District to a\uldb n\ulnone  R7D District property bounded by Grand Avenue, a line midway between Atlantic Avenue and Pacific Street, a line 100 feet southeasterly of Grand Avenue, and a line midway between Pacific Street and Dean Street; \uldb and Pacific Street;\ulnone  and\ul\par
\uldb 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R7A District a C2-4 District bounded by Grand Avenue, Pacific Street, a line 100 feet southeasterly of Grand Avenue, and a line midway between Pacific Street and Dean Street; and\par
\par
\ulnone 2\uldb 4.\ulnone\tab establishing within the proposed R7D District a C2-4 District bounded by Grand Avenue, a line midway between Atlantic Avenue and Pacific Street, a line 100 feet southeasterly of Grand Avenue, and a line midway between Pacific Street and Dean Street; \uldb and Pacific Street;\ul\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ulnone\par
as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated September 23, 2019, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-550, Community District 8, Borough of Brooklyn. \f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\f0\par
Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on August 27, 2020, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
